prompts.title: Blog Post Outline
prompts.prompt: Write a cozy blog post outline about [topic] for [audience]. Include an engaging hook, 5 main points with cottagecore metaphors, and a gentle call-to-action.

prompts.title: Instagram Caption
prompts.prompt: Write a warm, inviting Instagram caption for [image description]. Include storytelling elements, 3 relevant hashtags, and end with a question to encourage engagement.

prompts.title: Pinterest Pin Description
prompts.prompt: Create an SEO-optimized Pinterest pin description for [product/content]. Include relevant keywords naturally, highlight benefits, and create urgency without being pushy.

prompts.title: Email Newsletter
prompts.prompt: Write a cozy email newsletter about [topic]. Start with a personal story, share valuable tips, and end with a soft product mention. Keep it under 300 words.

prompts.title: YouTube Script Intro
prompts.prompt: Write a warm, engaging YouTube video intro for a tutorial about [topic]. Hook viewers in the first 10 seconds and preview what they'll learn.

prompts.title: TikTok Hook Ideas
prompts.prompt: Generate 5 scroll-stopping TikTok hooks for content about [topic]. Each should be under 10 words and create curiosity.

prompts.title: Carousel Slide Copy
prompts.prompt: Write copy for a 7-slide Instagram carousel teaching [topic]. Each slide should have a headline and 1-2 supporting sentences.

prompts.title: Story Sequence
prompts.prompt: Create a 5-story Instagram sequence that builds anticipation for [product launch/announcement]. Include polls and questions.

prompts.title: Thread Starter
prompts.prompt: Write a Twitter/X thread starter about [topic] that makes people want to read all 10 tweets. First tweet should be a bold statement or question.

prompts.title: Live Stream Outline
prompts.prompt: Create a 30-minute live stream outline for teaching [topic]. Include intro, 3 main sections, Q&A time, and a closing offer.

prompts.title: Digital Planner Pages
prompts.prompt: Design descriptions for 10 pages in a [theme] digital planner. Include daily, weekly, monthly spreads, goal trackers, and reflection pages.

prompts.title: Journal Prompts Set
prompts.prompt: Create 30 reflective journal prompts for [audience/theme]. Make them thought-provoking but gentle, perfect for cozy morning journaling.

prompts.title: eBook Outline
prompts.prompt: Outline a mini eBook about [topic] for [audience]. Include 5 chapters, key takeaways for each, and a downloadable bonus idea.

prompts.title: Printable Bundle Ideas
prompts.prompt: Brainstorm 10 printable items for a [theme] bundle. Include wall art, checklists, trackers, and organizational tools.

prompts.title: Template Pack Concepts
prompts.prompt: Describe 15 Canva templates for a [niche] Instagram template pack. Include feed posts, stories, reels covers, and highlights.

prompts.title: Course Module Outline
prompts.prompt: Create a 5-module mini course outline teaching [skill]. Each module should have 3 lessons with clear outcomes.

prompts.title: Workbook Structure
prompts.prompt: Design the structure for a [topic] workbook. Include exercises, reflection questions, action steps, and celebration milestones.

prompts.title: Notion Template Design
prompts.prompt: Describe a comprehensive Notion template for [purpose]. Include databases, views, automations, and aesthetic customizations.

prompts.title: Membership Content Calendar
prompts.prompt: Create a 3-month content calendar for a [niche] membership. Include weekly content types, monthly themes, and bonus surprises.

prompts.title: Bundle Upsell Strategy
prompts.prompt: Design an upsell bundle for [main product]. Include 3 complementary products and write compelling bundle copy.

prompts.title: Product Description
prompts.prompt: Write a cozy, compelling product description for [product]. Highlight benefits over features, use sensory language, and create gentle urgency.

prompts.title: Launch Email Sequence
prompts.prompt: Outline a 5-email launch sequence for [product]. Include teaser, value email, offer email, FAQ/objections, and last chance.

prompts.title: Sales Page Sections
prompts.prompt: Write the key sections for a [product] sales page: headline, problem, solution, features, testimonial prompts, and CTA.

prompts.title: Testimonial Request
prompts.prompt: Write a friendly email requesting a testimonial from a customer of [product]. Include specific questions to guide their response.

prompts.title: Collaboration Pitch
prompts.prompt: Write an outreach email for collaborating with [type of creator/brand]. Be genuine, highlight mutual benefits, and propose specific ideas.

prompts.title: Freebie Opt-in Copy
prompts.prompt: Write opt-in page copy for a free [type of freebie] about [topic]. Include headline, 3 bullet benefits, and simple form copy.

prompts.title: Black Friday Promo
prompts.prompt: Create Black Friday promotional copy for [product/bundle]. Include email subject lines, social captions, and urgency elements.

prompts.title: Affiliate Program Description
prompts.prompt: Write the description for an affiliate program for [product]. Include benefits, commission structure, and promotional asset ideas.

prompts.title: Webinar Promotion
prompts.prompt: Create promotional content for a free webinar about [topic]. Include registration page copy, reminder emails, and social posts.

prompts.title: Customer Win-Back Email
prompts.prompt: Write a warm win-back email for customers who haven't purchased in 90 days. Include a special offer and gentle reminder of value.

prompts.title: Brand Story
prompts.prompt: Write a compelling brand story for [business name] that connects with [target audience]. Include the journey, mission, and values.

prompts.title: Brand Voice Guide
prompts.prompt: Define the brand voice for [business]. Include tone descriptors, words to use/avoid, and example sentences.

prompts.title: Color Palette Meaning
prompts.prompt: Explain the meaning and emotion behind a color palette of [colors] for a [niche] brand. Include usage guidelines.

prompts.title: Tagline Options
prompts.prompt: Generate 10 tagline options for [business name/description]. Each should be memorable, under 8 words, and capture the brand essence.

prompts.title: Bio Templates
prompts.prompt: Write 5 different bio versions for [business/creator]: Twitter (160 chars), Instagram, LinkedIn, Pinterest, and website.

prompts.title: Mission Statement
prompts.prompt: Craft a mission statement for [business] that inspires both the team and customers. Keep it under 50 words.

prompts.title: About Page Copy
prompts.prompt: Write the About page copy for [business website]. Include the founder story, values, and what makes the brand unique.

prompts.title: Brand Mood Board Description
prompts.prompt: Describe the visual elements for a [aesthetic] mood board. Include textures, imagery, typography, and color descriptions.

prompts.title: Customer Persona
prompts.prompt: Create a detailed customer persona for [product/business]. Include demographics, pain points, desires, and where they hang out online.

prompts.title: Brand Differentiator
prompts.prompt: Identify and articulate 5 unique differentiators for [business] compared to competitors in the [niche] space.

prompts.title: ChatGPT Custom Instructions
prompts.prompt: Write custom instructions for ChatGPT to act as a [role] helping with [tasks]. Include personality, expertise, and response style.

prompts.title: Midjourney Prompt
prompts.prompt: Create a Midjourney prompt for a [style] image of [subject]. Include style references, lighting, mood, and aspect ratio.

prompts.title: Content Repurposing Plan
prompts.prompt: Create a plan to repurpose a [type of content] into 10 different content pieces across multiple platforms using AI tools.

prompts.title: AI Workflow Automation
prompts.prompt: Design an AI-powered workflow for [task]. Include tools, triggers, and step-by-step automation sequence.

prompts.title: Prompt Template Library
prompts.prompt: Create 5 reusable prompt templates for [use case] that can be customized with variables for different situations.

prompts.title: AI Content Brief
prompts.prompt: Write a comprehensive content brief for AI to generate [type of content]. Include context, tone, structure, and examples.

prompts.title: Batch Content Generation
prompts.prompt: Design a batch prompt to generate [number] [type of content] at once. Include variation parameters and quality checks.

prompts.title: AI Research Assistant
prompts.prompt: Create a prompt that turns AI into a research assistant for [topic]. Include research questions, source evaluation, and summary format.

prompts.title: Voice Clone Script
prompts.prompt: Write a script that captures [person/brand] voice for AI to replicate. Include speech patterns, vocabulary, and example phrases.

prompts.title: AI Quality Checklist
prompts.prompt: Create a checklist for reviewing and improving AI-generated content for [use case]. Include accuracy, tone, and brand alignment.

prompts.title: 90-Day Goal Setting
prompts.prompt: Create a 90-day goal framework for [business goal]. Include milestones, weekly actions, and success metrics.

prompts.title: Pricing Strategy
prompts.prompt: Develop a pricing strategy for [product/service]. Include value-based pricing rationale, tiers, and comparison positioning.

prompts.title: Passive Income Ideas
prompts.prompt: Brainstorm 10 passive income product ideas for a [niche] creator with [skills]. Include effort level and income potential.

prompts.title: Revenue Diversification
prompts.prompt: Create a revenue diversification plan for [business]. Include 5 income streams with implementation timeline.

prompts.title: Time Audit Template
prompts.prompt: Design a time audit framework for a [type of] business owner. Include categories, efficiency scores, and optimization suggestions.

prompts.title: Outsourcing Roadmap
prompts.prompt: Create an outsourcing roadmap for [business]. Identify tasks to delegate, hiring timeline, and team structure.

prompts.title: Quarterly Review Template
prompts.prompt: Design a quarterly business review template covering goals, revenue, wins, lessons, and next quarter priorities.

prompts.title: Competitor Analysis
prompts.prompt: Create a competitor analysis framework for [business/niche]. Include what to research, how to position differently, and opportunities.

prompts.title: Launch Checklist
prompts.prompt: Create a comprehensive launch checklist for [product type]. Include pre-launch, launch day, and post-launch phases.

prompts.title: Customer Journey Map
prompts.prompt: Map the customer journey for [product/service] from awareness to advocacy. Include touchpoints and optimization opportunities.

prompts.title: Morning Affirmations
prompts.prompt: Write 10 empowering morning affirmations for [type of person] building [type of business]. Make them specific and actionable.

prompts.title: Imposter Syndrome Script
prompts.prompt: Write a self-coaching script for overcoming imposter syndrome as a [profession/creator]. Include reframes and evidence gathering.

prompts.title: Boundaries Template
prompts.prompt: Create scripts for setting business boundaries around [situation]. Include professional but firm language.

prompts.title: Energy Management Plan
prompts.prompt: Design an energy management plan for a [type of] entrepreneur. Include high/low energy task allocation and recovery strategies.

prompts.title: Rejection Reframe
prompts.prompt: Write 5 reframes for common business rejections [examples]. Turn each rejection into a growth opportunity perspective.

prompts.title: Celebration Ritual
prompts.prompt: Design a celebration ritual for [type of wins]. Include small, medium, and big win celebrations that feel meaningful.

prompts.title: Decision Framework
prompts.prompt: Create a decision-making framework for [type of business decisions]. Include values alignment, pros/cons, and gut-check questions.

prompts.title: Burnout Prevention Plan
prompts.prompt: Design a burnout prevention plan for a solo [type of] business owner. Include warning signs, boundaries, and recovery protocols.

prompts.title: Fear Inventory
prompts.prompt: Create a fear inventory exercise for [business fear]. Include identifying, questioning, and action planning for each fear.

prompts.title: Values Alignment Check
prompts.prompt: Design a quarterly values alignment check for [business type]. Include reflection questions and realignment actions.

prompts.title: Seasonal Content Theme
prompts.prompt: Create a seasonal content theme for [season] that incorporates cottagecore aesthetics. Include post ideas, colors, and imagery suggestions.

prompts.title: Cozy Product Naming
prompts.prompt: Generate 10 cozy, cottagecore-inspired names for a [type of product]. Each name should evoke warmth, nature, and whimsy.

prompts.title: Nature Metaphor Copy
prompts.prompt: Rewrite [business concept] using nature and garden metaphors that resonate with cottagecore audience. Make it poetic but clear.

prompts.title: Slow Living Content
prompts.prompt: Create 10 content ideas around slow living and cottagecore lifestyle that subtly promote [product/service].

prompts.title: Aesthetic Mood Words
prompts.prompt: Generate 30 mood words and phrases for [cottagecore sub-aesthetic] that can be used in marketing and branding.

prompts.title: Cozy Email Sign-offs
prompts.prompt: Create 15 warm, cottagecore-inspired email sign-offs appropriate for [type of email]. Avoid being too casual for business.

prompts.title: Garden Analogy Framework
prompts.prompt: Create a garden analogy framework for explaining [business concept] to a cottagecore audience. Make it educational and enchanting.

prompts.title: Seasonal Collection Names
prompts.prompt: Name a 4-part seasonal collection of [products] with cottagecore-inspired names. Include brief description of each season's vibe.

prompts.title: Cozy Unboxing Experience
prompts.prompt: Design the unboxing/welcome experience for [digital product] with cottagecore touches. Include welcome message, surprises, and presentation.

prompts.title: Whimsical FAQ
prompts.prompt: Rewrite standard FAQ answers for [product/service] in a warm, whimsical cottagecore voice without losing clarity.

prompts.title: Task Breakdown
prompts.prompt: Break down [overwhelming task] into tiny, dopamine-friendly steps. Each step should take under 10 minutes.

prompts.title: Focus Session Plan
prompts.prompt: Create a focus session plan for [task] using body doubling principles. Include warm-up, main work, and reward.

prompts.title: Hyperfocus Project
prompts.prompt: Design a [project] that channels hyperfocus productively. Include guardrails to prevent burnout and exit points.

prompts.title: Routine Anchor
prompts.prompt: Create an anchor routine for [time of day] that helps transition into [work type]. Include sensory and movement elements.

prompts.title: Rejection Sensitive Script
prompts.prompt: Write a self-compassion script for when [type of rejection] triggers RSD. Include grounding and perspective-taking.

prompts.title: Novelty Refresh
prompts.prompt: Suggest 10 ways to add novelty and excitement to a [routine task/business area] that's become boring. Quick, low-effort ideas.

prompts.title: Quick Win List
prompts.prompt: Create a list of 15 quick wins for [business type] that can be done in under 5 minutes for instant dopamine.

prompts.title: Overwhelm Reset
prompts.prompt: Design a 15-minute overwhelm reset protocol for when [situation]. Include physical, mental, and task-clearing steps.

prompts.title: Interest-Based Nervous System
prompts.prompt: Reframe [boring task] to activate the interest-based nervous system. Find challenge, novelty, urgency, or passion angles.

prompts.title: Accountability Structure
prompts.prompt: Design an accountability structure for [goal] that works with ADHD tendencies. Include external, visual, and immediate components.

prompts.title: Welcome Sequence
prompts.prompt: Write a 3-email welcome sequence for new [product] customers. Balance value delivery with subtle upsell opportunities.

prompts.title: Thank You Message
prompts.prompt: Write 5 heartfelt thank you message variations for [purchase type]. Make each feel personal and genuine.

prompts.title: Check-In Email
prompts.prompt: Write a customer check-in email sent [timeframe] after purchase of [product]. Focus on support, not selling.

prompts.title: Refund Response
prompts.prompt: Write a gracious refund response email for [product] that leaves the door open for future relationship.

prompts.title: VIP Treatment Ideas
prompts.prompt: Brainstorm 10 ways to make repeat customers of [business] feel like VIPs. Mix digital and personal touches.

prompts.title: Surprise & Delight
prompts.prompt: Create 5 surprise and delight moments to add to the [product/service] experience. Low-cost, high-impact ideas.

prompts.title: Complaint Response
prompts.prompt: Write a template for responding to [type of complaint] that turns frustration into loyalty. Include empathy and action steps.

prompts.title: Milestone Celebration
prompts.prompt: Design customer milestone celebrations for [business]. Include 30-day, 90-day, 1-year, and achievement-based milestones.

prompts.title: Community Guidelines
prompts.prompt: Write warm but clear community guidelines for a [type of community]. Set boundaries while maintaining the cozy vibe.

prompts.title: Exit Survey
prompts.prompt: Create a kind exit survey for customers leaving [membership/subscription]. Learn while leaving a positive impression.
